A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This and FA are on par with Clone Wars. Disney\, please stop ruining these films. Studios continue to betray audiences with this swill\, which will hurt the future of cinema/theater-going. Someone at Disney\, please\, for the love of storytelling\, go back and reread Jospeh Campbell’s Heroes Journey and get back on track. It worked for Lucas’ original trio. That or hire Christopher Nolan to get on to something better. Half a star for poor acting\, lazy storytelling\, bad/awkward timing for comedy\, and an overall handling of character and plot that’s just embarrassing. Total disloyalty toward fans to lure meat into seats and sell toys. We need the Force back the way it was. Help us (any other studio)\, you’re our only hope.
